item.title: Getting started with here-api
item.description: Create a New Android Studio Project # From the Welcome to Android Studio dialogue box, select New Project… to open the Create New Project dialog. In the New Android Application dialog, under Application name, specify an appropriate application name. The remainder of this tutorial uses BasicMapSolution as the application name. Under Company Domain, specify an appropriate domain. Edit the package name by clicking the Edit link. The remainder of this tutorial uses com.
